 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּשַׁר‎</span>] **verb** ==interpret== (a dream) ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, perhaps Egyptian Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פשר‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>355</sup> [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>100</sup> (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> loan-word, see [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>263</sup>); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pašâru***</u></abbr>); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְמִפְשַׁר‎</span> [[Dan.5.16|Dan 5:16]], accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פִשְׁרִין‎</span> **Pa\`el** ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְפַשַׁר‎</span> [[Dan.5.12|Dan 5:12]], accusative <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חֶלְמִין‎</span>.
